headlines.description: Everton snapped a four-game losing streak on Saturday with a 2-0 win over West Ham at Goodison Park, easing the pressure on Marco Silva.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton beat West Ham to end losing run

headlines.description: Bournemouth and Norwich City both kept their first clean sheets of the season as their Premier League clash at the Vitality Stadium finished 0-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth held to scoreless draw by Norwich

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Aston Villa

headlines.description: Aston Villa ground out a last-gasp 2-1 home win over 10-man Brighton & Hove Albion in a gripping Premier League clash.
headlines.shortLinkText: Villa fight back to secure last-gasp win over 10-man Brighton

headlines.description: Chelsea secured a third successive Premier League win on Saturday, beating Newcastle 1-0 thanks to a Marcos Alonso goal with 20 minutes remaining.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea edge past Newcastle at Stamford Bridge

headlines.description: Youri Tielemans capped an inspired individual performance with a fine second-half winner as Leicester City came from behind to beat Burnley 2-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tielemans smashes Leicester winner as VAR denies Burnley

headlines.description: A fiercely contested late strike from Dele Alli that was awarded after a VAR review helped Tottenham beat Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Alli earns Spurs draw vs. Watford amid VAR chaos

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers' Raul Jimenez scored from the penalty spot to cancel out a second-half goal by Southampton's Danny Ings in an entertaining 1
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton end losing streak with draw at Wolves

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus and David Silva scored within minutes of each other as Manchester City beat Crystal Palace to keep pace with league leaders Liverpool.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City beat Palace to keep pace with Liverpool
